Sql.query: select tinfb.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia from trn_trans_infobase tinfb join trn_barra barr on tinfb.barrcodi = barr.barrcodi where tinfb.pericodi = :pericodi and tinfb.tinfbversion = :version group by tinfb.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia Order by barr.barrbarratransferencia

select barrcodi, barrbarratransferencia, dia, sum(energiadesbalance) as energiadesbalance, sum(energiaentrega) as energiaentrega, sum(energiaretiro) as energiaretiro from ( select tinfb.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia, tinfbd.tinfbdedia as dia, sum(tinfbd.tinfbdesumadia) as energiadesbalance, 0 as energiaentrega, 0 as energiaretiro from trn_trans_infobase tinfb join trn_barra barr on tinfb.barrcodi = barr.barrcodi join trn_trans_infobase_detalle tinfbd on tinfb.tinfbcodi = tinfbd.tinfbcodi where tinfb.pericodi = :pericodi and tinfb.tinfbversion = :version and barr.barrcodi = :barrcodi group by tinfb.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia, tinfbd.tinfbdedia UNION select tent.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia, tentde.tentdedia as dia, 0 as energiadesbalance, sum(tentde.tentdesumadia) as energiaentrega, 0 as energiaretiro from trn_trans_entrega tent join trn_barra barr on tent.barrcodi = barr.barrcodi join trn_trans_entrega_detalle tentde on tent.tentcodi = tentde.tentcodi join trn_trans_infobase tinfb on tent.barrcodi = tinfb.barrcodi where tent.pericodi = :pericodi and tent.tentversion = :version and barr.barrcodi = :barrcodi and tent.pericodi = tinfb.pericodi and tent.tentversion = tinfb.tinfbversion group by tent.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia, tentde.tentdedia UNION select tret.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia, tretde.tretdedia as dia, 0 as energiadesbalance, 0 as energiaentrega, sum(tretde.tretdesumadia) as energiaretiro from trn_trans_retiro tret join trn_barra barr on tret.barrcodi = barr.barrcodi join trn_trans_retiro_detalle tretde on tret.tretcodi = tretde.tretcodi join trn_trans_infobase tinfb on tret.barrcodi = tinfb.barrcodi where tret.pericodi = :pericodi and tret.tretversion = :version and barr.barrcodi = :barrcodi and tret.pericodi = tinfb.pericodi and tret.tretversion = tinfb.tinfbversion group by tret.barrcodi, barr.barrbarratransferencia, tretde.tretdedia ) t group by barrcodi, barrbarratransferencia, dia order by dia
